mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_board where BOARD_CODE = 'N'

select b.board_no boardNo, b.board_title boardTitle, b.MEMBER_NO boardWriter, b.board_date boardDate, b.IS_IMPORTANT isImportant, b.IS_SECRET isSecret, b.BOARD_CODE boardCode, m.MEMBER_ID boardWriterId from ( select rownum rnum, a.* from ( select board_no, board_title, MEMBER_NO, board_date, IS_IMPORTANT, IS_SECRET, BOARD_CODE from tbl_board where BOARD_CODE = 'N' order by board_date desc ) a ) b left join TBL_MEMBER m on b.MEMBER_NO = m.MEMBER_NO where rnum between #{start} and #{end}

SELECT BOARD_FILE_NO as boardFileNo, BOARD_NO as boardNo, FILE_NAME as fileName, FILE_PATH as filePath, FILE_UPLOAD_DATE as fileUploadDate FROM TBL_BOARD_FILE WHERE BOARD_NO IN
#{boardNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_BOARD ( BOARD_NO, BOARD_CODE, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, MEMBER_NO, BOARD_DATE, IS_IMPORTANT, IS_SECRET ) VALUES ( #{boardNo}, #{boardCode}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{boardWriter}, SYSDATE, #{isImportant}, #{isSecret} )
mapper.select: select board_file_no as boardFileNo, board_no as boardNo, file_name as fileName, file_path as filePath, FILE_UPLOAD_DATE fileUploadDate from tbl_board_file where board_no = #{_parameter}

select b.board_no, b.board_title, b.board_content, b.MEMBER_NO, m.MEMBER_ID, b.board_date, b.IS_IMPORTANT, b.IS_SECRET, b.BOARD_CODE from tbl_board b left join TBL_MEMBER m on b.MEMBER_NO = m.MEMBER_NO where b.board_no = #{_parameter} and b.BOARD_CODE = 'N'
select board_file_no boardFileNo, board_no boardNo, file_name fileName, file_path filePath, FILE_UPLOAD_DATE fileUploadDate from tbl_board_file where board_file_no = #{_parameter}

#{boardFileNo}
